name: The Grisly Goblet (free entrance for Orcs)
games: Pot limit Omaha, deuce to seven Lowball.
freeGrog:: Only for the ones that reach the final table.

name: Legolas Fixed Limit Cellar
freeGrog:: no, but there is live music and good service.
firstPrize: A unique travel opportunity to travel to the undying lands, a journey to Aman.

name: The Prancing Pony
freeGrog:: no, but there are complimentary snacks!
firstPrize: in this tournament the winner takes all! (minus 10 percent rake for the house and 5 percent cleaning expenses).

name: Smeagols Precious Inn
games: Strictly cashgames.. NO playing on credit!
buyIn:: games starting from 10 pieces of gold
freeGrog:: yes! all day long, as long as you play
firstPrize: It's a cashgame.. So when the money is gone, it's time to move on..

name: Saruman's Wizardly Poker Parlor
freeGrog:: Potions of unknown origin and snacks from Orthanc
firstPrize: A chance to be Saruman's apprentice (proceed with caution!)

name: Hobbiton Hold'em Haven
firstPrize: A year's supply of the finest Hobbit meals and a hobbit hole vacation

name: Elrond's Tranquil Poker Retreat
games: Elf Hold'em and Rivendell Stud Poker

name: Gondor's Royal Flush Casino
